tool_description: Maps ecliptic longitude coordinates to zodiac signs and calculates precise degrees and minutes within each sign.
error_messages: Invalid longitude: Ecliptic longitude must be between 0 and 360 degrees
Invalid precision: Coordinate precision must be between 0 and 4 decimal places
usage: Provide ecliptic longitude and optionally specify precision. Returns zodiac sign, degrees, and minutes within the sign.

decimal_position.description: Precise decimal position within the sign
